nl.strohalm.cyclos.entities.settings

Class LocalSettings.TransactionNumber

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.strohalm.cyclos.entities.settings.LocalSettings.TransactionNumber
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Enclosing class:
    LocalSettings

    public static class LocalSettings.TransactionNumber
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Contains parameters for generating a transaction number. The number is composed by 3 parts: a prefix, the padded identifier and a suffix. Both prefix and suffix may contain a date pattern between #, so, for example, if the prefix TN#yy-MM# is processed on january, 2006, the result would be TN06-01. To generate a # character, it must be escaped with \\#
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
